SageTVPlugin.Name: Automatic Aspect Ratio Mode Switcher
SageTVPlugin.Description:
This UI Mod plugin the provides the ability to automatically switch the playback aspect ratio mode depending on which channel, source or capture device the show was recorded from, with each aspect ratio set up to resize the video to the correct proportions.
This is a V7 port of Auto Aspect by nielm
SageTVPlugin.Author: nielm, JREkiwi
